meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
To extend the program of block grants to States for temporary assistance for needy families and related programs through September 30, 2019.

main.name: HR2940

content.p: To extend the program of block grants to States for temporary assistance for needy families and related programs through September 30, 2019.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Extension of the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families Program and related programs through September 30, 2019.
section.content: Activities authorized by part A of title IV and section 1108(b) of the Social Security Act shall continue through September 30, 2019, in the manner authorized for fiscal year 2018, and out of any money in the Treasury of the United States not otherwise appropriated, there are hereby appropriated such sums as may be necessary for such purpose.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
